[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Retail sales ticked up 0.4 percent in June but came in below analyst expectations. Julia Coronado, chief North America economist for BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss consumer spending, interest rates and the housing market.

"}]
description: Retail sales ticked up 0.4 percent in June but came in below analyst expectations.
title: June retail sales up, but not over
contentencoded: Retail sales ticked up 0.4 percent in June but came in below analyst expectations. Julia Coronado, chief North America economist for BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss consumer spending, interest rates and the housing market.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 15, 2013
teaser: Retail sales ticked up 0.4 percent in June but came in below analyst expectations.
